messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory]
messages.msgSnippet: In European Swordsmanship, the right hand is used for the sword because it places the heart furthest away from the attacker.  Safer place to have it. The left
messages.messageBody:
In European Swordsmanship, the right hand is used for the sword because it
places the heart furthest away from the attacker. Safer place to have it.
The left hand was used for a shield to protect the heart.

Scott Erickson
Heijoshin@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
